detail_desc: STUDIO COLLECTION. A subtle yet distinctive scent for everyone. Top notes: bergamot, lavender and freesia. Heart notes: orange blossom, white flowers and apple. Base notes: patchouli, amber and musk. 75 ml.
Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Braided hat with an imitation suede band. Width of brim 8 cm.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Windbreaker in woven fabric with piping in a contrasting colour. Stand-up collar, detachable hood with a concealed hook and loop fastening and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Discreet pockets in the side seams and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
High biker boots in imitation leather with an adjustable tab, decorative zip on the outside and zip on the inside. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with elastication and a tie at the waist, and frilled hems.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in pleated jersey with an elasticated waist and laser-cut hem. Lined.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped key pocket at the back, ventilating mesh sections on the legs and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Socks knitted in a soft, patterned cotton blend with elasticated tops.

V-neck nursing top in soft, ribbed jersey made from organic cotton with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with functional fastening for easier nursing access and an elasticated hem.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, patch front pockets, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, fly with a concealed zip, and short, wide legs.
Shirt in airy pima cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed fastener. Shoulder pads, 3/4-length sleeves with slits at the cuffs, and a tie belt at the waist. Partly lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Tie in grosgrain with an embroidered pattern. Width 7 cm.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a lined, padded, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a zipped inner pocket, narrow ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ankle-length dress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck and wrapover top. Seam under the bust, a concealed zip in one side and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Lined.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and raw-edge hem.
Double-layered hat in soft, patterned jersey.
All-in-one suit in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Knee-length dress in soft, patterned jersey with a wrapover top that has a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.
Gilet in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, front pockets and a ribbed hem.

Fully lined bikini top with a tie detail at the front, underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Pleated satin skirt with a wrapover front, ties at one side and concealed buttons in the waistband. Lined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Brazilian briefs in ribbed microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool with appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in airy cotton poplin with broderie anglaise, an opening at the top and a small frilled collar with ties at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Unlined.

Padded jacket in sturdy fabric with a slight sheen. Faux fur-lined hood with a faux fur trim, stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud. Lined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and legs with seams and ribbed hems.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hoodie in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Flannel shirt in a soft cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and a rounded hem. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Cut-off, frayed edges at the cuffs and hem.
Sports top in fast-drying, functional fabric with a small V-neck at the front with decorative straps and short cap sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Trenchcoat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a hook-and-eye fastening at the top and a loose yoke at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets, and a single back vent. Lined.
High-waisted shaping briefs in microfibre and mesh that have a sturdy, sculpting effect on the tummy and waist with a mesh-lined front, lined gusset, high cut at the back and laser-cut edges.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, a loop at the back and adjustable straps at the top with decorative, rounded studs and metal buckles. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Long shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Baseball jacket in woven fabric with appliqués on the front, a small, ribbed stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.

Bralette in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Double, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Decorative, crossover straps at the front and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.
Long, fine-knit cardigan in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Bell-shaped skirt in an airy viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist. Unlined.
Jumper knitted in soft chenille yarn with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a small print motif on one sleeve, seam centre front and asymmetric hem. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless top with a V-neck front and back.
Long-sleeved running top in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, twisted seams at the front and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Reflective details.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Shirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Ankle-length running tights in an extra-firm, tight fit that focuses on the thighs. The tights create pressure on the legs that is highest at the hems and is gradually reduced towards the top to aid circulation. The special design and high elastane content help the tights to retain their effect and properties over a long period. Elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, mesh key pocket in the waistband, and reflective details.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top, pleats at the shoulders and short gathered sleeves. Seam at the waist, concealed zip in one side and a bell-shaped shirt. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a zip down the front with a chin guard, a decorative drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined in pile.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a tab and metal buckle at the side of the waistband, and a wrapover front with an inner button. Unlined.
Vest top in soft viscose jersey with an asymmetric hem.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Small comfort blanket in an organic cotton weave with a padded head. Length from top to toe approx. 31 cm. Wingspan approx. 29 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend in various designs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Turn-down collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Adjustable tie/bow tie with a plastic fastener.
Short, fitted skirt in patterned jersey. High waist with concealed elastication, and a slit at the front of the hem.
Two-button jacket in a cotton Oxford weave with a chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted top in jersey with wide shoulder straps and a knot detail at the top.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication, and an overlocked hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in a silk blend with lace, lined cups and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lace-covered elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles, a magnetic fastener at the top and one zipped inner compartment. Unlined. Size 33x36x48 cm.
Slightly wider jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
